scripts.clean:js: rm -rf dist/js && mkdir dist/js && mkdir dist/js/algorithms
scripts.build:js: yarn run clean:js && cp src/js/* dist/js/ && cp src/algorithms/*.js dist/js/algorithms/ && yarn run rollup:worker
scripts.build:wc: yarn run clean:wc && emcc src/wasm-c/threads.c src/algorithms/*.c -s USE_PTHREADS=1 -s PTHREAD_POOL_SIZE=4 -o ./dist/wasm-c/threads.js
scripts.build: yarn run build:js && yarn run build:wc
